name: Slush Invaders: Game
storyline: After the Slush Invaders infiltrate the Slusher's turf they succesfully capture most of their fighters, but with some of them remaining they try and put a stop to their big boss' plan by tossing him around and not letting him escape. You traverse 20+ levels with places such as a college campus, the countryside, a winter village, and even a digital world, some of them with bossfights.
summary: A stickman skill-toss flash game made by Gildedguy where you must rescue your captured fighters and stop the villain by launching him into the skies. It has a very colorful aesthetic, derivative from stick animations from it's time. Features a lot of playable characters that allows for different team combinations with varying functions and upgrades for each member.
